医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
MD 安德森成立新研究所以推进细胞治疗德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心今天宣布成立细胞疗法发现与创新研究所，该研究所将以长期的 MD 安德森临床和研究专业知识为基础，引领世界为有需要的患者开发和推进有影响力的细胞疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/MD-Anderson-launches-new-institute-for-advancing-cell-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/MD-Anderson-launches-new-institute-for-advancing-cell-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5e48a93-70e0-4301-bff5-9aa4893c4bdf Fri, 08 Nov 2024 14:42:13 -0500 MD Anderson launches new institute for advancing cell therapy
研究人员发现阻碍癌症治疗反应的代谢阻断免疫系统是癌症治疗的主要目标。免疫检查点抑制剂和 CAR-T 细胞疗法可以显着改善许多癌症的治疗结果。但对于大约 70% 的患者来说，这些疗法不起作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Researchers-uncover-metabolic-blockade-that-impedes-cancer-treatment-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Researchers-uncover-metabolic-blockade-that-impedes-cancer-treatment-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6eece3b6-d50e-4e4b-907c-9f0018541ebd Fri, 08 Nov 2024 14:09:05 -0500 Researchers uncover metabolic blockade that impedes cancer treatment response
CoronaVac 后出现的血栓性血小板减少性紫癜病例引发了对疫苗安全性的担忧COVID-19 大流行促使世界范围内各种疫苗的快速开发和管理，一些报告将这些疫苗与免疫性血栓性血小板减少性紫癜 (TTP) 联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Thrombotic-thrombocytopenic-purpura-cases-after-CoronaVac-raise-concerns-over-vaccine-safety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Thrombotic-thrombocytopenic-purpura-cases-after-CoronaVac-raise-concerns-over-vaccine-safety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ec1ef50-7d41-40e3-8310-1deb4d437a32 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 14:02:26 -0500 Thrombotic thrombocytopenic purpura cases after CoronaVac raise concerns over vaccine safety
SARS-CoV-2 劫持宿主蛋白以逃避免疫清除维也纳医科大学和因斯布鲁克医科大学的研究人员发现，SARS-CoV-2 劫持了三种重要的宿主蛋白，这些蛋白会抑制补体系统的活性，而补体系统是早期抗病毒免疫的关键组成部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/SARS-CoV-2-hijacks-host- Proteins-to-escape-immune-clearance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/SARS-CoV-2-hijacks-host- Proteins-to-escape-immune-clearance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2457e6e9-39bf-48b5-859f-d9a7623d6efb Fri, 08 Nov 2024 13:38:00 -0500 SARS-CoV-2 hijacks host proteins to escape immune clearance
AI-READI 联盟启动突破性糖尿病数据研究研究人员今天（2024 年 11 月 8 日）发布了一项雄心勃勃的研究的旗舰数据集，该研究涉及可能影响 2 型糖尿病发展的生物标志物和环境因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/AI-READI-consortium-launches-groundwriting-diabetes-data-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/AI-READI-consortium-launches-groundwriting-diabetes-data-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1741da80-e8ec-46da-86c5-34b28ab03919 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 13:28:16 -0500 AI-READI consortium launches groundbreaking diabetes data study
癌症治疗前后的身体活动如何改善治疗结果在化疗之前、期间和之后进行体力活动都是有益的。新的博士研究更仔细地研究了那些选择退出的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/How-physical-activity-before-and-after-cancer-treatment-improves-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/How-physical-activity-before-and-after-cancer-treatment-improves-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43942b01-3790-413e-baf3-ba3c777971e8 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 12:27:08 -0500 How physical activity before and after cancer treatment improves outcomes
地中海饮食可降低脂肪肝患者患 2 型糖尿病的风险研究人员调查了坚持地中海饮食如何降低患有代谢功能障碍相关脂肪肝病的成人患 2 型糖尿病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Mediterranean-diet-may-reduce-type-2-diabetes-risk-in-fatty-liver-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Mediterranean-diet-may-reduce-type-2-diabetes-risk-in-fatty-liver-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82097788-ce3b-4dc7-b4a6-ddbee169931a Fri, 08 Nov 2024 11:52:00 -0500 Mediterranean diet may reduce type-2 diabetes risk in fatty liver patients
液体活检检测胰腺偶发瘤的进展在最近发表在 eGastroenterology 上的研究中，J-Matthias Löhr 博士及其同事对胰腺偶发瘤的诊断方法进行了深入回顾；在针对其他疾病的成像扫描过程中经常检测到的偶然发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Advancements-in-liquid-biopsy-for-detecting-pancreatic-incidentalomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Advancements-in-liquid-biopsy-for-detecting-pancreatic-incidentalomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ed2687d-8411-4ee6-bec2-a3f0cab63267 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 11:47:12 -0500 Advancements in liquid biopsy for detecting pancreatic incidentalomas
循环肿瘤细胞作为肝细胞癌早期检测的工具肝细胞癌（HCC）是一个重大的全球健康问题，特别是在亚太地区，慢性病毒性肝炎和肝病导致其高发病率和死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Circulated-tumor-cells-as-a-tool-for-early-detection-of-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Circulated-tumor-cells-as-a-tool-for-early-detection-of-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6228ff6a-5325-4f9d-a5b7-d3b44f50adb1 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 11:35:44 -0500 Circulating tumor cells as a tool for early detection of hepatocellular carcinoma
公众对 COVID-19 疫苗科学的信任影响美国疫苗的使用研究人员调查了美国公众对 COVID-19 疫苗科学的信任发生了怎样的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Public-trust-in-COVID-19-vaccine-science-influences-vaccine-uptake-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Public-trust-in-COVID-19-vaccine-science-influences-vaccine-uptake-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97613f4e-79af-4a25-a55e-5f5959af8f52 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 11:25:00 -0500 Public trust in COVID-19 vaccine science influences vaccine uptake in the US
